title: Set up Azure OIDC authentication for GitHub Actions
description:
Configure federated identity credentials so GitHub Actions can deploy to Azure without storing secrets.

## Tasks
- Create Microsoft Entra app registration
- Configure federated credential for main branch
- Assign Contributor role at subscription level
- Add GitHub secrets: AZURE_CLIENT_ID, AZURE_TENANT_ID, AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
- Test with az account show workflow

## Reference
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/bicep/deploy-github-actions

title: Rebase and squash CI commits on master
description:
The master branch has accumulated messy CI iteration commits that should be squashed/rebased into cleaner commits. This will make the git history more readable and maintainable.

## Tasks
- Review commits on master that are CI-related iterations
- Interactive rebase to squash related commits
- Force push cleaned history (coordinate with team if needed)

## Lesson Learned
Use feature branches + PRs for CI/CD work to avoid polluting master with iteration commits.
